223517830.body:
$IDEX  I don’t own any IDEX shares, but I did some research about the news just because I’m bored ( waiting on that $xspa shit). There is something wrong about Hindenburg report, “and that the “facility is actually operated by almost 100 sales groups,” none of whom had “heard of [Ideanomics] or MEG.”” I can tell you one one knows about IDEX in china. They own by Sun seven stars group, which is MUCH bigger and well-known company in China. If they just asking them about IDEX, no wonder on one knows . At the same time, IDEX don’t make any EVs. I believe they are just middleman, ( that’s 2% commissions of the contract and share with Qingdao city), again that’s why sales group don’t know IDEX, they are not from IDEX. ~5.1m from Jiudao that’s only 102k for IDEX . IDEX claimed they have orders from Jiudao and DiDi, and I Check their websites , none of them mention ( IDEX , Or MEG ,Or seven stars) or even the purchase itself. ( yes I read chinese) . 

Play at your own risk .
